node.title: Livestream: Justice Minister with 'three strikes' law announcement
node.description: The Justice Minister speaks at the Beehive.
node.content: ["This livestream is expected to start at 11am.\u00a0", "Justice Minister Kris Faafoi is holding a press conference at the Beehive in Wellington to speak on the Government's action to repeal 'three strikes' sentencing.\u00a0", "The three strikes law, which came into force under National and ACT in 2010, means third-time serious offenders get the maximum sentence with no chance of parole.", "Former Justice Minister Andrew Little was forced to backtrack on plans to repeal three strikes after Labour's then-coalition partner NZ First indicated it wouldn't support it.\u00a0", "Watch the livestream.\u00a0", "App users watch here.\u00a0"]
